review: This little stick is great for steaming shows and movies right to your tv. The menus are simple and easy to understand. The remote works perfectly and the options are easily adjustable. In the end, a great value.
author: J. Lancaster "joshlancs"

review: Ok, so....I LOVE the concept of the Roku stick BUT when we got ours the "NEW" batteries that came with it, didn't work...in ANYTHING!  The remote is sticky...meaning, sometimes, it doesn't seem to be syncing with the Roku stick, so none of the buttons work. This only happens maybe 10% of the time, but it's enough to be annoying. I WOULD, however, buy another one of these in a heartbeat!!!

review: I have several Roku's of different types. This one is the prefect solution for both my workout room and my son's bedroom. Limited to 720P but the picture has been clear with no shuddering. Works well and is easy to set up.
